Proposal.description: Schema for a proposal to improve User Stories and address defects.

target_defect_ids.description: List of defect IDs that this proposal aims to address.

contents.description: List of proposal contents detailing the actions to be taken.

ProposalContent.description: Schema for individual proposal content within a proposal, detailing the action to be taken on a User Story.

type.description: The type of action for the proposal content.

story_key.description: The story key for UPDATE or DELETE actions. Null for CREATE actions.

summary.description: A brief summary of the User Story. Only valid for CREATE or UPDATE actions.

description.description: A detailed description of the User Story. Only valid for CREATE or UPDATE actions.

explanation.description: An explanation of the rationale behind the proposed action.

response_schema.description: Schema for the output of the proposal generator.

proposals.description: List of generated proposals to solve all the defects.
